Ricky.bio: Co-founder and captain. Loves the armband, Argyle till he dies, dry January survivor, failed to keep his bike accident a secret.

Nick.bio: Co-founder and captain. Gym lover with chaotic darts technique. Autistically dedicated to websites, data, and immaculate spreadsheets.

Phil L.bio: OG Monster and vice-captain. Software dev by day, unstoppable chatterbox by night, fuelled by beer and dog stories.

Rob.bio: Opened his Monsters career with a 180 and retired the trick immediately. Builds kids’ games, occasionally plays cricket.

Filip.bio: Obsessed with posting averages, never quiet, always up for DC. Passionate, emotional, and prone to losing his head mid-match.

James B.bio: Pub-based darting specialist. Loves a session, Millwall fan, vanished mid-season for Vegas and never fully recovered.

George.bio: Welsh countryside export. Fined very often, missed the board plenty. Runs a glove company, dodges HMRC rumours.

Jack.bio: Scouted from the Alex Beckett league. 180 machine from down under, premium signing, usually found in the smoking area.

Paddy.bio: OG Monster and first to order every night. Forgets shirts, loves Baby Guinness, thrives on rattling opponents’ heads.

Billiams.bio: OG Monster. Accident-prone, scruffy, vanished for three days in 2023. Loves late nights, no first name, endless stories.

Simon.bio: Appears once a season, usually injured. Throws nothing straight but remains strangely optimistic every single year.

Andre.bio: Alex Beckett legend and record-holder. First Monster to nail a ton-plus bull finish. Dreadlocked, calm, quietly deadly.

Fraser.bio: Glaswegian Trainline alumni. Impossible to understand, always smoking, louder after beers, somehow still effective at the oche.

Phil A.bio: Not actually named Argyle, just obsessed with them. Puts alarming effort into fancy dress and Plymouth loyalty.

James R.bio: Loves a rave, hits 180s in warm-up, then politely refuses to repeat it in matches.

Brad.bio: Always marked available, always up for it. Consistently enthusiastic, occasionally dangerous, and never misses a chance to throw darts.

Codon.bio: Maximum two games a year. Frequently missing, permanently capped, mysteriously bald, and proudly part-time at best.

Gary.bio: Lives in the pub, hates Christmas, communicates exclusively in voice notes. Colda player with unmatched bar stamina.

Luke.bio: Young gun and Exeter City fan. Loves a Paddy Power board, confident thrower, and showing flashes of serious potential.

Magnus.bio: Ex-Monster turned Silverback. Swedish baker with dodgy teeth. Recently beaten in a clutch victory that still hurts.

Lloyd.bio: Former OG Monster now living in New Zealand. Easily convinced into “just one beer” despite pretending otherwise.

Rhino.bio: South African smoker who vanished after 2023. Still owes fines, hasn’t been seen since, but remains legend-adjacent.

Bobby.bio: Shockingly muscly, suspiciously bald. Looks like Gollum, throws with menace, and never remove the cap under any circumstances.
